author: Tatiana Baez
title: Animal Planet’s truly unFURgettable tradition: 10 adorable Puppy Bowl moments you need to watch
text:
Sunday, Feb 5, 2017 10:30 PM UTC Animal Planet’s truly unFURgettable tradition: 10 adorable Puppy Bowl moments you need to watch Brown puppies, white puppies, small puppies, big puppies, all breeds of puppies. Did I mention there are puppies? Topics: animal planet , puppy bowl , reader polls , Super Bowl , Entertainment News A Puppy Bowl VIII participant (Credit: Getty/Cindy Ord) 
Another year, another Super Bowl. It’s hard to get excited about a football game when you’re not a sports fan, especially when one of the players is a Donald Trump fan (looking at you, Tom Brady). Something I can get amped about is Animal Planet’s annual Puppy Bowl. For 13 glorious years, puppies of all kinds have graced our TV screens and given relief to those of us who “can’t even” with sports. Today’s Puppy Bowl aired at 3 p.m. ET. Don’t worry if you missed it — clips will surely take over your social media feeds in the next 24 hours. That is, unless Lady Gaga outdoes herself. Enjoy my personal favorite moments from Puppy Bowls past below. Tatiana Baez is mostly Salon's social media coordinator, but she also writes here and elsewhere . She lives in Brooklyn and tweets .
